long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This will change the background for all sites you visit to a flashing random color changing background.

WARNING: This may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.
